item.title: GitHub Cheatsheet
item.description: Find The Version Of Git git --version Create A New Git Repository Go to the fold of the project. Run git init Clone An Existing Git Repository Cloning is the process of pulling down a copy of a repository stored on a server. Go to the parent folder of where you want to repository’s folder to be in. git clone [url to repository's git file] [name of folder / repository you want]
